PageTitle: display bgp flow vpnv4 vpn-instance routing-table statistics
FuncDef: The display bgp flow vpnv4 vpn-instance routing-table statistics command displays statistics about BGP VPN Flow Specification routes.
CLIs: display bgp flow vpnv4 vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> routing-table statistics
display bgp flow vpnv4 vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> routing-table peer <ipv4-address> advertised-routes statistics
display bgp flow vpnv4 vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> routing-table peer <ipv4-address> received-routes statistics
display bgp flow vpnv4 vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> routing-table peer <ipv4-address> received-routes active statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays routes of a specified peer.
This value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays information about routes advertised to a specified peer.
-

Displays information about routes received from a specified peer.
-

Displays information about the active routes received from a specified peer.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp flow vpnv4 vpn-instance vpna routing-table statistics
<HUAWEI> display bgp flow vpnv4 vpn-instance vpna routing-table peer 10.2.1.2 received-routes active statistics
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp flow vpnv4 vpn-instance routing-table statistics command displays statistics about BGP VPN Flow Specification routes.
